name.jp: 挑戦のイーグルマント

description.en: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.br: A Capa Águia do Principiante aumenta todos os atributos base em +5 e vida máxima (HP) em +100. O Selo da Águia é exibido em destaque.
description.cns: 启蒙级金鹰披风，增加所有基础属性+5，最大血量+100。披风凸显着鹰的印记。
description.de: Der Initiate's Eagle Cloak erhöht alle Statuspunkte um +5 und deine HP um +100. Das Siegel eines Adlers wird stolz präsentiert.
description.fi: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape d'Aigle Initié augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +5 et vos PV max de 100. Le Sceau de l'Aigle est bien en vue.
description.id: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak meningkatkan semua statistik dasar sebesar +5 dan HP Max sebesar +100. Segel Elang ditampilkan dengan jelas.
description.it: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 挑戦のイーグルマントは、全ステータスを+5、HPの最大を+100増加させます。鷲の紋章が記されています。
description.kr: 도전의 독수리 망토는 모든 기본스탯을 5, 최대 체력을 100 증가시킵니다. 독수리의 봉인이 확실하게 보여집니다.
description.nl: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.pl: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ru: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Águila del Iniciado aumenta todas las estadísticas base en +5 y la HP Máxima en +100. El Sello del Águila se muestra de forma destacada.
description.sw: The Initiate's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +5 and HP Max by +100. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.th: Eagle Cloak ของ Initiate เพิ่ม stst พื้นฐานทั้งหมด +5 และ HP สูงสุด +100 ตราประทับของนกอินทรีปรากฏอย่างเด่นชัด
description.tw: 全能力+5和HP+100的見習之鷹斗篷，老鷹的樣式將顯現在斗篷上
description.vi: Áo choàng đại bàng của Initiate tăng tất cả các chỉ số cơ bản lên +5 và HP tối đa lên +100. Con dấu của Đại bàng được hiển thị nổi bật.
